whatHappensNext.cy: Mae eich adroddiad wedi’i anfon at Gangen Digwyddiadau’r Asiantaeth Safonau Bwyd. Byddant yn cysylltu â chi os oes angen rhagor o wybodaeth.
whatHappensNext.en: Your report has been sent to the Incidents Branch of the Food Standards Agency. They will contact you if more information is required.
